name: FRACTAL (itch) (user17359)
description:
FRACTAL is a blend of turn-based strategy, tower defense and  rougelite. Player defends endless labirynth growing stronger with every generetion of it.

Made for Rainbow Game Jam 2022 by:

@user17359

@senior-cpp-developer

music created using aiva.ai

font: FFF Forward

Game tips:

  • Every turn is split into 3 initiatives. Most enemies move one tile in every initative, and all towers act on certain initiative
  • Towers need an activist to function, to assign one click on the button with human silhouette and then on desired tower. But beware! Activists, are limited like all resources, and player needs idle ones to get coins.
  • By completing quests which are located in bottom-left corner of the screen player can get prism shards - currency which persists over runs and can be used to unlock powerful upgrades for towers, or additional activists
  • There are three modes adding activists (human silhouette), creating towers (plus) and upgrading (arrow upwards)
  • You can rotate towers by left clicking on them while being in adding mode
  • You can delete towers by right clicking on them (outside of turn)
